InfoPage.paragraph1: Hello! I'm a frontend developer specializing in React and Next.js. I've worked on various projects from marketing solutions to 3D web games at startups. I can handle the entire process from design to deployment and focus on building user-friendly web services. I enjoy learning new technologies and trends quickly and applying them to real projects. I believe in growing together with my teammates and strive to create valuable results, ultimately maximizing business impact.

AstarmizePage.title: Astarmize
AstarmizePage.subtitle: B2B Marketing Content Automation AI Service Client Development
AstarmizePage.projectOverviewText: Developed the client for a B2B marketing content automation AI service. This service simplifies and automates the marketing content creation process through a user-friendly interface and various features, including a WYSIWYG editor, Instagram post auto-distribution system, and multi-layer image editing functionality.
AstarmizePage.achievement1: Improved user content creation efficiency by developing a ProseMirror-based WYSIWYG editor and custom plugins
AstarmizePage.achievement2: Implemented an Instagram post auto-distribution system using Meta Graph API, reducing content upload time by 70%
AstarmizePage.achievement3: Created multi-layer image editing functionality using Canvas API, eliminating dependence on external graphic tools and streamlining workflow, resulting in a 40% reduction in user work time
AstarmizePage.achievement4: Built a multilingual support system (Korean, English, French) using i18next
AstarmizePage.achievement5: Optimized and automated CI/CD pipeline using Github Actions, reducing deployment time from 15 minutes to 3 minutes (80%) and improving development productivity

HoeyoPage.title: Hoeyo
HoeyoPage.subtitle: Cultural Arts Space Website Development
HoeyoPage.projectOverviewText: Designed and developed a website that embodies the brand identity of the cultural arts space Hoeyo. The goal was to implement Hoeyo's unique artistic sensibility in the web space and provide an optimized user experience across various devices. Built a modern and intuitive interface using pure HTML, CSS, and JavaScript.
HoeyoPage.achievement1: Designed and developed a website that embodies the brand identity of the cultural arts space Hoeyo using JavaScript, HTML5, and CSS3
HoeyoPage.achievement2: Implemented responsive web design using CSS3 media queries and Flexbox/Grid layouts to provide an optimized user experience across various devices

CopyklePage.title: Copykle
CopyklePage.subtitle: B2C Marketing Content AI Service Client Development
CopyklePage.projectOverviewText: Developed the client for a B2C marketing content AI service. This service enables individual users to easily create and manage marketing content based on AI-generated content through a blog-style editor and payment system. Content placement is flexible with drag-and-drop functionality, and accessibility is enhanced with social login and responsive design.
CopyklePage.achievement1: Developed a blog-style AI content editor - Implemented a WYSIWYG editor that allows users to freely arrange and edit AI-generated text/images with drag and drop functionality
CopyklePage.achievement2: Applied Toss Payments module to provide a secure and convenient payment experience, improving payment conversion rate by 60%
CopyklePage.achievement3: Implemented OAuth 2.0-based social login (Google, Naver), reducing registration time by 80% and increasing new registrations by 100%
CopyklePage.achievement4: Implemented responsive web design, reducing mobile user bounce rate
CopyklePage.achievement5: Built a Next.js frontend server based on AWS EC2
